## Background
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of techno-economic assessments for mineral processing and metallurgical process flowsheets for the Research and Development (R&D) phase of technology development.

## Scope of Work
The selected proponent will be required to conduct techno-economic assessments in accordance with AACE International Class 5 Estimates. This work will involve evaluating the technical and economic feasibility of various mineral processing and metallurgical process flowsheets.

## Contract Details
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-06-18 14:00
* Contract Duration: From the date of contract award to March 31, 2025, with an option to extend for four (4) additional years.
* Solicitation Method: Competitive - Open bidding

## Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on a highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
